backend/main.mo: Manages inquiries and user profiles with admin‑protected CRUD endpoints and role‑based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping UI changes and form‑submission fixes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, and styling updates.
frontend/.env: Environment file defining site name and a placeholder frontend canister ID.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file with site name and empty frontend canister ID placeholder.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting updated branding, metadata, and font loading for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering NavBar, Home, About, Contact, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing brand name, contact details, and Instagram link in a three‑column layout.
frontend/src/components/LightboxModal.ts: Modal component displaying a large image with title, category, and a close button.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navbar with brand label, Home and About links, and a Get in Touch button.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with company highlights, specialties, and descriptive text. Uses cards and grids to display experience, values, and service categories.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact page with contact details and an inquiry form using custom hooks for form handling. Includes success state UI and validation error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Displays the hero section with background imagery, headline text, and buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections. Includes a subtle scroll indicator and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Package: Shows detailed package information using an accordion layout populated from packagesData. Displays coverage, deliverables, turnaround times, and optional add-ons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Provides a filterable photo gallery with category buttons and a lightbox modal for viewing images. Filters portfolioData and tracks selected images and categories.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Displays pricing tiers with cards populated from pricingTiers and highlights the featured option. Includes a scroll handler to jump to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/packages.ts: Defines the PackageDetails interface and exports an array of detailed photography packages. Each package lists pricing, coverage, deliverables, turnaround, add-ons, and terms.
frontend/src/content/portfolio.ts: Defines portfolio item types and exports a static list of categorized photo entries.
frontend/src/content/pricing.ts: Defines pricing tier structure and exports three predefined photography packages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryForm.ts: Implements client-side inquiry form state, validation, and submission using a saveInquiry mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading, login, and identity management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for inquiries, user profiles, and authorization using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and typography for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrls.ts: Generates canonical ICP canister URLs and detects local or canonical domains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, scope changes, branding updates, and known issues for a photography website.
